GeneDef.label: shielded drone
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are shielded hivemind drones. They have no influence on the hivemind.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Tip:</color> <color=#8a8ae6>Hivemind drones</color> with <color=#8a8ae6>psy- sensitivity below 20%</color> cannot influence other <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> drones.
